item.description:
For August Meetup, let's have a portrait photoshoot in the Boston Public Gardens. I plan to have a makeup artist and models participate in this photoshoot. We will shoot with the natural lighting;

Please bring your camera's flash in case you would like to use fill-flash and reflector (if you have one).

At the park, we will work in small groups, the number of groups are depending to how many models will be there (we will rotate the model so that each group has a chance to work with all the models. We need at least one reflector per group so please bring one a long if you have it. Per each group

We will meet at the Boston Public Garden (on the bridge at 9AM): http://files.meetup.com/830833/BostonCommonsMeetupLocation.pdf

A suggestion of $5.00 donation to the cost of maintains this meetup site.

Make up artist:

Hair and Makeup by Shelley Robinson:  http://eyefulbeauty.com/

List of models

Confirmed: 

Lauren Anderson: http://files.meetup.com/830833/LaurenAnders...

                              http://www.bostoncasting.com/PennyLane

Jeana Jordan: http://files.meetup.com/830833/JeanaJ.pdf

Jessenia: http://files.meetup.com/830833/Jessenia.pdf

Caitlyn Larvey: http://files.meetup.com/830833/CaitlynLarve...

Tentative

item.name: Portrait Photoshoot in the park (time: 9:00 AM to 1:00 PM)
